doc.title: Making of 'The Vault'
doc.plot: This made-for-video documentary gives horror fans a behind-the-scenes look at the making of The Vault, about a group of students who start exploring an abandoned school, only to discover a terrifying secret hidden away in the basement. Also included are interviews with the cast and crew, who share some of their experiences from working on the film and discuss the special efforts that went into bringing the project to completion.
